table.name: vtiger_tours
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_tours` ( `toursid` int(19) NOT NULL, `name` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `toursno` varchar(100) DEFAULT NULL, `date_start` date DEFAULT NULL, `date_end` date DEFAULT NULL, `qty` int(7) DEFAULT NULL, `profit` decimal(5,2) DEFAULT NULL, `tags` varchar(1) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`toursid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

table.name: vtiger_tourscf
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_tourscf` ( `toursid` int(19) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`toursid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
